attention_text: Attention: The text you've entered exceeds the page boundaries.
resume_warning: Your resume may extend across more than one page.
create_resume: Let's Create Your Stunning Resume âœ¨
congratulations_text: You've successfully filled out all the sections. If you're happy with the result, you can download your CV as a PDF. If you wish to make changes, feel free to go back to any section and update your details.
experienceText_description: Please describe your professional experience. Include details such as previous positions, companies you've worked for, key responsibilities, and achievements.
educationText_description: Please provide details about your educational background, including degrees, certifications, and institutions attended.
educationText_subTitlePlaceholder: e.g., Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
educationText_contentPlaceholder: Describe the institution, field of study, and achievements.
volunteeringText_description: Share details about your volunteer work. Include the organizations, roles, and contributions you made.
volunteeringText_contentPlaceholder: Describe your responsibilities and the impact of your work.
projectsText_description: Highlight significant projects you've worked on. Include the project's purpose, your role, and any notable achievements.
projectsText_contentPlaceholder: Describe the project, your role, technologies used, and results.
languagesText_header: List the languages you know, along with your proficiency level.
hobbiesText_header: Showcase your personal interests and hobbies. This helps highlight your well-rounded personality and may indicate skills or qualities valuable to potential employers.
aboutSectionTitle: Tell us a little about yourself!
aboutSectionDescription: Share your strengths, passions, or anything you'd like others to know about you. This section is your chance to shine and make a great impression.
contentPlaceholder: e.g., I am a dedicated software engineer with a passion for solving complex problems and learning new technologies...
